It's parade day!

Tonight at 7:00pm our local fire companies and police departments will be holding a parade to celebrate our Class of 2020 graduates.

The parade will start from the high school, turn right on to rt443, turn left onto Spruce Street and continue to Veteran’s Park (the tank) where it will turn right onto 895. After turning right onto Tulpehocken Street, it will proceed through the heart of Pine Grove, through North Pine Grove, and then continue to Tremont and Donaldson following the traditional route. The parade will make it’s way back to Pine Grove, returning to the school parking lot to disperse.

We invite and encourage all of the Pine Grove, Tremont, and Donaldson communities to come out and safely support our graduates. Feel free to sit along the route, display signs and banners, and cheer on The Class of 2020.
